name: Alpine Convention Atlas
description: The Alpine Convention Atlas is the repository for the data collected in the framework of the Alpine Convention activities, its Working Groups and its network. Its aim is to collect, organize and disseminate the results of research activities carried out by the Alpine Convention and its Working Groups as well as by European projects in the Alpine region. It allows browsing by category to explore layers, thematic maps and documents or to create and upload your own maps and layers.
